good <- function(C,xbar,S,n,q,alpha){
 transform <- C %*% xbar
C %*% S %*% t(C)
T_square <- n * ( t(C%*%xbar) %*% solve(C%*%S%*%t(C)) %*% C%*%xbar  )
F_value <- (n-1)*(q-1)/(n-q+1) * qf(1-alpha, df1 = q-1, df2 = n-q+1)
listOfvalue <- list(T_square,F_value,transform)



return(listOfvalue)
}
